title: _SET_CONTROL_NORMAL
content:
0xE8A25867FBA3B05E// SetControlNormal
BOOL _SET_CONTROL_NORMAL(int padIndex, int control, float amount);Parameters:padIndex: The control system instance to use. See ENABLE_ALL_CONTROL_ACTIONS.control: The control ID to check.amount: An unbounded normal value.This is for simulating player input.
codeBlocks:
// SetControlNormal
BOOL _SET_CONTROL_NORMAL(int padIndex, int control, float amount);
